jobDescription: Works with senior leadership to oversee architecture and technology delivery for the Frederick product line (MINDBODY’s automated marketing product for local businesses). This includes leading technical projects, managing software engineers, proposing architectural solutions, and identifying technologies, frameworks, and standards for team adoption.  The Manager will be responsible for keeping assigned projects on track, ensuring the right resources are on teams to reach milestones and work with stakeholders to determine the right architecture and scope for each project.  This role is expected to be initially 50% / 50% individual contribution/management but may vary over time with changes to assigned duties and team size.  Engineers on the Frederick team work on several software applications across a microservices architecture, with full test coverage, continuous integration (CI), and continuous delivery (CD). Back-end development primarily utilizes Ruby-on-Rails, while front-end development primarily utilizes React.MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS AND REQUIREMENTS:
